titles.title: Defund Extremism Working Group Act
Defund Extremism Working Group Act
To limit the use of Federal funds authorized by the National Defense Authorization Act for Fiscal Year 2024 for the Department of Defense Countering Extremism Work Group.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Armed Services.

bill.summary:
Defund Extremism Working Group Act
This bill prohibits the use of funds authorized by the National Defense Authorization Act for Fiscal Year 2024 for the Department of Defense Countering Extremism Working Group.
